transitions.name: a_roll_transition
transitions.description: Creates a roll transition effect by scrolling the first clip vertically before transitioning to the second clip.

transitions.name: b_roll_transition
transitions.description: Overlays a B-roll clip onto the main clip, positioned and resized to match the main clip.

transitions.name: crossfade_transition
transitions.description: Applies a crossfade effect between two clips using crossfadein and crossfadeout effects.

transitions.name: fade_transition
transitions.description: Applies a fade-out effect to the first clip and a fade-in effect to the second clip.

transitions.name: slide_transition
transitions.description: Creates a horizontal slide transition by scrolling the first clip out and the second clip in.

transitions.name: wipe_transition
transitions.description: Implements a simple wipe transition effect. This needs adjustment for the desired result.

transitions.name: zoom_transition
transitions.description: Zooms in on the first clip while zooming out on the second clip to create a zoom transition effect.

transitions.name: split_transition
transitions.description: Splits the first clip into parts and reveals the second clip through those parts. This implementation needs completion.

transitions.name: circle_reveal_transition
transitions.description: Uses a circular mask to reveal the second clip from the center outward.

transitions.name: page_turn_transition
transitions.description: Creates a page turn effect using a mosaic-like transition.

transitions.name: light_leak_transition
transitions.description: Adds a light leak effect between two clips using a pre-existing light leak video.

transitions.name: inverted_colors_transition
transitions.description: Creates an effect by inverting the colors of the first clip before transitioning to the second clip.

transitions.name: dissolve_transition
transitions.description: Applies a dissolve effect by fading out the first clip and fading in the second clip.

transitions.name: rotate_transition
transitions.description: Rotates the first clip while transitioning to the second clip.

transitions.name: diagonal_wipe_transition
transitions.description: Creates a diagonal wipe effect to transition between two clips.

transitions.name: heart_shape_transition
transitions.description: Uses a heart-shaped mask to transition between two clips. This implementation needs adjustments to handle masks and opacity correctly.

transitions.name: film_roll_transition
transitions.description: Rolls the first clip out vertically and transitions to the second clip.

transitions.name: ripple_transition
transitions.description: Applies a ripple effect to the first clip before transitioning to the second.

transitions.name: starfield_transition
transitions.description: Creates a starfield effect before transitioning to the second clip.
